actions.abilityText:
When the enemy monster performs a switch action, that monster heals 1[HP] and discard this aura.

When all time counters are removed from this, next turn your opponent must reveal their selected action before you select yours.
If the enemy monster switched in this turn, this attack gains pierce and [FLIP] [FLIP] [FLIP].~PIERCE~
This attack gains [FLIP] [FLIP] when this monster has a lockdown counter on it.

abilityText:
At the start of the turn, put a lockdown counter on this monster if it doesn't already have one. If it does, remove the lockdown counter instead.

While this monster has a lockdown counter on it, the enemy monster cannot perform switch actions.
